name: Thrilling Hunt
description:
Thrilling Hunt is prototype made in GB Studio, for an academic project, which consists of taking the character, that loves to hunt ghosts, going into a house where a ghost resides and completing the ritual in order to abolish the ghost from there.

The game was heavily insipired by Phasmophobia and Project Kat.

If you enjoy, please leave some feedback!

Here is our form for academic research, we would apreciate if you could share your feedback with us.

https://forms.gle/SxKuuVgqD3NZSFf88

Thank you!

Controls:

W/A/S/D - movement

Z - Interaction with objects

Enter - Missions Menu
